name: Search for a lexical unit
content:
% Search for a given lexical unit, for instance: "ran"

match { N [phon="ran"] }

name: Search for a lexical lemma
content:
% Search for a given lemma, for instance: "run"

match { N [phon="run"] }

name: Search by grammatical category
Search for a dependency relation
Search for both relations and categories
Filter with NAP (Negative Application Patterns)
content:
% Search for verbs without subject

match { V [cat="VERB", VerbForm <> Ger|Inf|Part, Mood <> Imp] } % basic pattern: a verb with some constraints on VerbForm and Mood 
without { S[]; V -[nsubj|csubj|nsubjpass]-> S}                  % first negative pattern: there is no "subject" node
without { N[]; N -[cop|aux|auxpass|conj]-> V}                   % second negative pattern: the verb if not a dependent of a relation "cop", "aux", â€¦
